# EDITTING THIS FILE DIRECTLY IS NOT RECOMMENDED
# THIS FILE IS GENERATED BY BUILD/assemble.sh

# First column is what type of familiar
# Second column is priority number
# Third column is what familiar
# Fourth column (optional) is conditions for that item to be considered
# See sl_check_conditions for information on valid conditionals
# A familiar can be listed multiple times (presumably with different conditionals)
# First familiar found that is available, can be used, and meets its conditions (if any) will be used

init	1	Cute Meteor
init	2	Oily Woim
# Unfortunately Happy Medium is half as effective at boosting init
# That and it's booze isn't terribly relevant nowadays, so it's been demoted
init	3	Happy Medium

# Undead familiars only when a zombie
item	0	XO Skeleton	path:Zombie Master;prop:_xoHugsUsed<11

# Do we wanna grab cubeling drops? Usually yes.
item	2	Gelatinous Cubeling	prop:sl_useCubeling=true;prop:sl_cubeItems=true
# Cheerleader isn't subject to weight restrictions in KOLHS, so let's just use it before almost anything to be safee
item	3	Steam-Powered Cheerleader	path:KOLHS

# Typical starfish are better than whelps
# Whelps on average restore .375*(weight+5)
# Superwhelps up this to 0.75*(weight+5)
# But starfish restore roughly 0.25*weight PER TURN
# and average combat length looks to be ~6 rounds in sl_ascend, so that's 1.5*weight on average
# Not even bothering with cocoabos
regen	0	
# Ash is nice
regen	1	Galloping Grill	prop:_hotAshesDrops<5
# Tokens are nice
regen	2	Rogue Program	prop:_tokenDrops<5
# Hugpockets are good, Xs and Os are good, even if whelps aren't as good as starfish
regen	3	XO Skeleton	prop:_xoHugsUsed<11
# Free stuff!
regen	4	Lil' Barrel Mimic
# It's a starfish with reduced activation rate, except it ALWAYS attacks on turn one, so that's probably more hits per battle on average in short battles? oh, and it's a sombrero too
regen	5	Galloping Grill
# A super starfish (50% activation instead of 33%)
regen	6	Sausage Golem
# A slightly boosted starfish, for pastamancers
regen	7	Animated Macaroni Duck	class:Pastamancer
# Regular starfish
regen	8	Unspeakachu
